changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_select_recipe_production') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_select_recipe_production GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_select_recipe_production @owner_id dbo.id_t, @recipe_code dbo.code_t AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Building_Select_Recipe_Production_Infos WHERE building_id = @owner_id AND recipe_code = @recipe_code
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_select_recipe_production') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_select_recipe_production GO
